entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
